articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il inspects KPA unit defending Height 1211
articles.content: Past news

articles.title: Banquet for participants in April art festival
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il inspects KPA unit defending Height 1211
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, on Tuesday inspected a KPA unit which defends Height 1211 in the east of the front.
   He was accompanied by KPA vice marshals Jo Myong Rok, Kim Yong Chun and Jon Jae Son, KPA generals Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Ha Gyu and Pak Jae Gyong, and staff members of the KPA supreme command.
   He went up to the watch post on the top of Height 1211.
   He grasped the topographical conditions, the deployment and situation of the enemy troops, looking at the enemy's position one thousand metres away. And he was informed of the situation by the unit's commander.
   He said the task of the unit which defends Height 1211, a vantage point in the east of the front, is very important.
   He then went round the  old battle sites on Height 1211, including the pits used by the people's army soldiers during the war.
  He said the undying feats of the heroic soldiers who unhesitatingly dedicated their youth and lives to security of  the Workers' Party of Korea, the leader and the generous system will remain long with the thriving socialist homeland.
   He went on to say that the noble self-sacrificing spirit and indomitable revolutionary spirit displayed by the defenders of Height 1211, including the hero Ri Su Bok who blocked the enemy's gun muzzle with his chest and opened up the route of charge for his unit, still remain in the hearts of all the people's army soldiers and that no force on earth can match  the KPA soldiers who are ready to dedicate their lives to the country and people.
   He then went round a bed room, a dining hall, a store, a hothouse and other logistic facilities. He noted with  high appreciation that the commanding officers with warm love for their soldiers provided excellent living  conditions to the soldiers.   He urged the officers to take warm care of them as their real parents would, as the soldiers are valuable revolutionary comrades and the treasure of the country.
   He attended a class education seminar of soldiers.
   He called for  steadily strengthening class education and other politico-ideological education of the soldiers.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il then called on the soldiers of a nearby company named after Ri Su Bok.   He went round the armory, bedroom and other places of the company.
   He expressed great satisfaction with the growth of all the soldiers into a-match-for-a hundred combatants.
   He then visited Mt. Jihye on the forefront, which President Kim Il Sung climbed up on September 23, 1951, to put forward  wise operational policies for the defence of Height 1211.
   After going round the historic site, Secretary Kim Jong Il said the president worked hard all his life for the freedom and welfare of the people, experiencing all kinds of troubles. He added that the president's  undying feats will shine forever along with the prosperous country.
   Together with senior officials, he paid tribute to the President  on his 85th birth anniversary in humble reverence before a monument.
   He gave the unit machineguns, automatic rifles and binoculars as gifts  and posed for photographs with soldiers.

articles.title: Party given in north Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Banquet for participants in April art festival
   Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Administration Council of the DPRK gave a banquet for the participants in the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival on Apr. 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Invited to the banquet were foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes. 
   Present there were Ri Jong Ok and Pak Song Chol, who are politburo members of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and vice presidents, and officials concerned.   Speeches were made on the occasion.

articles.title: Foreign artistes visit Presidential Statue
articles.content:
Party given in north Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The north Hamgyong provincial administrative and economic committee gave a party on Apr. 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Invited to the party were Chinese and Russian consuls general and consulate-general officials in Chongjin.
   Speeches were made at the party, which proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Foreign political figures visit Korean embassies
articles.content:
Foreign artistes visit Presidential Statue
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited the Statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on his 85th birth anniversary.
   They were carrying a placard reading "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be With Us".
   They laid floral baskets and bouquets and made respects before the Statue of the President.

articles.title: Banquet for overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Foreign political figures visit Korean embassies
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign political figures visited Korean embassies in their countries from April 9 to 11 on the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Among them are Princess Norodom Bophadevi of Cambodia= A delegation of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia= Zimbabwean political figures including the National Chairman of the Central Committee of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front= Pantagi Alexandru, Chairman of the Romanian Communist Party= and First Secretary Alexander Paunov and other leaders of the Central Committee of the Commuist Party of Bulgaria.
    They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and expressed reverence for him.
   Princess Norodom Bophadevi said the special relations of friendship and cooperation between Korea and Cambodia 
Established by the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the respected king Norodom Sihanouk are in full bloom under the deep care of the great leader of the Korean people Marshal Kim Jong Il.
   Pantagi Alexandru noted that the cause of President Kim Il Sung will be carried forward and his exploits will shine long, thanks to Secretary Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Alexander Paunov stressed that President Kim Il Sung, a prominent activist of the international communist movement and working-class movement, was a great leader who devoted everything to the independence and prosperity of the country, freedom and happiness of the people, reunification of the country and victory in the socialist cause of the world from the first days of his revolutionary activities to the last moment of his life.

articles.title: Performances given on birthday of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Banquet for overseas Koreans 
   Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il took care that a banquet was given for overseas Koreans on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Kim Yong Sun, Chairman of the Reunification Policy Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly and Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his toast that the respected Secretary Kim Jong Il arranged a grand banquet for the overseas Koreans who have come to the homeland with deep reverence for the President.
   The President's was a great life of a legendary man, a peerlessly great leader who led the revolution and construction to brilliant victory, sharing weal and woe with the people through trials under the motto, "one is sure to win if he believes in and depends upon the people",  Kim Yong Sun noted.  He further said:
   Today, our country is making a triumphant advance, creditably defending the Korean-style socialism centred on the people without any vacillation despite the unheard-of moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle it politically, economically and militarily. This is because the DPRK has the defender of its destiny in the person of Secretary Kim Jong Il possessed of extraordinary intelligence and outstanding leadership ability, iron will and matchless grit. 
   Ho Jong Man, Chief Vice-Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Choe Chong San, Vice-Chairman of the Federation of Korean Nationals in China, and Ju Yong Il, Vice-Chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, and others made speeches at the banquet.
   They pointed out that, thanks to the great general, President Kim Il Sung will enjoy immortality, Juche Korea and the Korean people will be everlasting, the spring holiday of April and the Korean-style socialism will exist for all ages and the Korean nation will remain the most dignified and happiest people forever under the guidance of the two great leaders.
   The homeland is dynamically advancing along the road of Juche and victory under the warm love and wise guidance of Secretary Kim Jong Il empowered with great qualifications, the speakers said, and declared:
   "We will glorify our life and demonstrate our pride of being overseas citizens of the Juche homeland by upholding him with loyalty and filial piety."
   An art performance was given at the banquet.

articles.title: Evening entertainment of youth and students
articles.content:
Performances given on birthday of President Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given at the Kaeson Youth Park, Mt. Taesong, the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and other parks, recreation grounds and theatres in Pyongyang to commemorate the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung.
   Programmes of the Mansudae Art Troupe, the State National Art Troupe, the Film and Radio Music Troupe, the Korean Film Studio, the State Comic Troupe and the Pyongyang Circus included the revolutionary opera "True Daughter of the Party", the light comedy "Blessings", the puppet show "Yellow Pearl and Blue Pearl",  story-telling pieces and songs.
   The performances brought joy to the working people, people's army soldiers, youths and students on the holiday of April 15.
   Art performances were also given at theatres and cultural houses in all parts of the country including the Hamhung Grand Theatre.

articles.title: Revolutionary monuments erected
articles.content:
Evening entertainment of youth and students 
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- An evening entertainment of youths and students in Pyongyang was held on April 15 to commemorate the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung.
   It was attended by Ri Jong Ok, Kim Yong Nam and other officials.
   Invited there were foreign delegations and delegates and foreign guests on a visit to Korea, foreign diplomatic envoys and embassy officials.
   Put on the stage were "Fortune of Korea", "One Big Family" and other songs, rhythmic gymnastics, Janggo dance, circus and other colorful pieces.
   Foreign guests and overseas Koreans also danced with youths and students.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan commemorate April 15
articles.content:
Revolutionary monuments erected 
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Monuments dedicated to President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary activities were erected in various places on his 85th birth anniversary.
   The places include Phyongsan county of north Hwanghae Province and Taedong county of south Phyongan Province and Pyongyang locomotive corps.
   A Revolutionary Museum was opened in Saeppyol county of north Hamgyong Province.
   The President visited the county four times during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and many times after the liberation of the country.

articles.title: Cambodian crewmen's symposium
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan commemorate April 15 
  Tokyo, April 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- A central meeting of Koreans in Japan was held in Tokyo on April 14 on the 85th birth anniversary of the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
   Present there were Han Tok Su, Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), vice-chairmen and officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
   Han Tok Su said in his speech that the April holiday makes him remember the warm care of the Generalissimo, stressing that officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan should uphold him as the eternal leader and take the road of patriotism under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   Vice-Chairman So Man Sul said in his report that the 80 odd years of the Generalissimo was a brilliant life of a peerlessly great man who performed immortal exploits for the country, nation, era and humankind. 
    The reporter praised the Generalissimo as an elder and outstanding leader of the world  revolution who performed great feats for the cause of global independence.
    So Man Sul called upon Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to vigorously advance under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il, who embraces and leads them as the Generalissimo did.

articles.title: Letters to Secy. Kim Jong Il from overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Cambodian crewmen's symposium 
 Ppyongyang, Aapril 16 (KCNA) -- Crewmen of the Cambodian ship "Singbenghoe-8" held a symposium on President Kim Il Sung's noble virtues in Haeju port on April 14 to commemorate his 85th birth anniversary.
   Speakers at the symposium said that after President Kim Il Sung returned in triumph to the country, he delayed visiting his native home in Mangyongdae and met the workers to encourage them to build a new country.
   The President put forward the working class as the masters of the country and bestowed unlimited loving care on the people, they said.
   They noted that the Korean people uphold and follow the President as their eternal father and that Korea is a strong socialist country based on the wholehearted unity of the leader and the people.

articles.title: Pak Song Chol meets Rwandan Party delegation
articles.content:
Letters to Secy. Kim Jong Il from overseas Koreans
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received letters from the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) and the Federation of Korean Nationals in China on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The letter from the International Kothongryon said that President Kim Il Sung's was the most brilliant life of the respected leader who devoted his all solely to the liberation of the country, the development of the nation and the happiness of the people.
   He founded the great Juche idea and applied it successfully, thus turning Korea, which eclipsed in the world map in the past, into a powerful socialist state of Juche and the Korean nation into the most dignifed nation in the world, the letter pointed out.
   Recalling that he exerted all his energies to provide the Korean nation with a reunified country, the letter declared that they would devote their all to the work to bring earlier the day of national reunification.
   The letter from Korean nationals in China said that all the results of the deep loving care, tireless efforts and wise leadership of the respected Generalissimo Kim Il Sung are demonstrating their might all over the world under the guidance of Secretary  Kim Jong Il.
   It noted that the marshal is wisely directing overseas Koreans along the road of patriotism for the country and the nation by successfully applying the Juche-based idea of the President on the overseas Koreans' movement.

articles.title: Talks between Korean, Cambodian Party delegations
articles.content:
Pak Song Chol meets Rwandan Party delegation 
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Politburo member of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and DPRK Vice-President Pak Song Chol met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of the Rwandan patriotic front led by Vice-Chairman of the Front Denis Polisi at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on April 15.
   The head of the delegation highly praised the lines of the WPK and its achievements in ideological, technological and cultural fields.
   He said that President Kim Il Sung will always be with the world people.

articles.title: Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang railway line opened to traffic
articles.content:
Talks between Korean, Cambodian Party delegations 
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on April 15 between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea And the People's Party of Cambodia.
   Present there on the Korean side were Kim Yang Gon, Department Director of the Party Central Committee, officials concerned and on the opposite side were the delegation led by Ney Pena, member of the Standing Commission of the Party Central Committee and Vice-Chairman of the Party Control Committee.
   At the talks the sides informed each other of their party activities and discussed a series of matters of common concern.

articles.title: King of Cambodia sends floral basket
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in Poland 
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Tseshin Publishing House in Poland published volume 1 of part i "the anti-Japanese revolution" of "With the Century", the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, on Mar. 25 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
   Seen in the book is a photo of President Kim Il Sung in his study.

articles.title: Message to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreign artistes
articles.content:
King of Cambodia sends floral basket 
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- King of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk sent a floral basket to the embassy of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Hanging from the floral basket was a ribbon reading "sincerest and deepest respect to his excellency Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people." 
   Kong Sam Ol, Deputy Prime Minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, and the executive director and members of the general bureau of the Royal Palace laid the floral basket in the name of the Cambodian king and made respects before the portrait of President Kim Il Sung on April 11.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il receives gifts from foreign  parties and figures
articles.content:
Message to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreign artistes 
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the participants in the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival on April 15, the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The message noted:
   The birth of his excellency the respected Kim Il Sung was the most auspicious event which heralded the origin of socialist Korea and which was specially recorded in human history.
   His was a life devoted to the struggle to provide popular masses with the happiest life and achieve the reunification of the country and the prosperity of the whole nation.
   In particular, the fact that he wisely directed the cultural development of Korea and humankind is one of the valuable exploits he performed in his lifetime.
   So, artistes from different countries come to Pyongyang every year on the occasion of the historic birth anniversary of the President and hold the April Spring Friendship Art Festival. 
   Though the President passed away, we feel his solicitude through your excellency  as warmly as ever.
   While touring various places of your country, we have come to know well that the cause of the President is being successfully carried forward under your leadership and the future of your country is firmly guaranteed by your guidance.
   We express deep thanks to you for taking measures to glorify the April Spring Friendship Art Festival as an international art festival.
   We sincerely wish your excellency good health and a long life for the development of Korea, the reunification of Korea and for the happiness of the future generations.

articles.title: Foreigners express reverence for President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il receives gifts from foreign  parties and figures 
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from Chea Sim, Chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia, the C. C., the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil, the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxism-Leninism) the C. C., the Czechy-Morava Communist Party, the National Union of Bank Employees of Malaysia and the Trade Federation of Uzbekistan.
   The gifts were handed to Choe Thae Bok, alternate politburo member and secretary of the C. C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned by Ney Pena, member of the Standing Commission and Vice-Chairman of the Control Committee of the C. C., the People's Party of Cambodia= Claudio Campos, secretary general of the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil= K.P. Oli, member of the Standing Committee of the C. C., the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxism-Leninism)= Vlastimil Balin, First Vice-Chairman of the C. C., the Czechy-Morava Communist Party= K. Sanmugam, general secretary of the national union of bank Employees of Malaysia= and K.M. Rafikov, vice-chairman of the trade federation council of Uzbekistan.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il also received gifts from the friendship delegation of the Communist Party of China headed by Li Beihai, vice-director of the International Liaison Department of its Central Committee, the delegation of the Dominican Workers' Party led by Ivan Rodriguez, chairman of 
Its central committee, and Ludo Martens, Chairman of the C. C., the Belgian Labor Party, and Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea.

articles.title: Floral baskets laid before Presidential statues
articles.content:
Foreigners express reverence for President Kim Il Sung
   Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic corps and the UNDP representative to Korea and former deputy leader of the National Party of Thailand Sa-Ard Piyavan and his entourage visited the Kumsusam Memorial Palace on April 15, the 85th birth anniversary of   President Kim Il Sung.
    They made bows to the President, who is preserved in state and looked round his relics. 
   The diplomatic corps, Nigerian Ambassador to Korea Olugbenga Ayodeji Ashiru and his embassy officials and Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang and his embassy officials visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill to lay floral baskets and make bows on the same day.
    Chinese and Russian consuls general in Chongjin and consulate officials laid floral baskets before the President's Statue in Chongjin and Chinese delegations before his statue in Hyesan.
    Iranian Ambassador to Korea Seyed Morteza Mirheidari and his embassy officials, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy in Pyongyang M. Ayaz Khan and his embassy officials and Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang and his embassy officials visited Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Kumgangsan Youth Line
articles.content:
Floral baskets laid before Presidential statues
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA -- Floral baskets were laid before the Statue of  President kim il sung on Mansu Hill on April 15, his 85th birth anniversary.
   A floral basket sent by Secretary Kim Jong Il was standing before the Statue.
    Floral baskets were presented in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central People's Committee of the Democratice People's Republic of Korea, the Administration Council, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Public Security, units of the Korean People's Army, Commissions and ministries of the Administation Council, the Korean Children's Union,  political parties, public organizations, central state organs, other units, factories, enterprises and co-op farms in Pyongyang.
    Working people, soldiers of the People's Army, schoolchildren and students laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers there.
   Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were also laid before his statues in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Interview of chief of Havana mission of  NDFSK
articles.content:
Kumgangsan Youth Line
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The young people of Korea finished the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang railway project as a gift to the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The 100-odd-km Kumgangsan Youth Line opened to traffic on Tuesday with due ceremony.  The project is a product of the President's wish and the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea. The project included the construction of some ten stations, tens of tunnels and bridges and many other structures.
   The line is from Anbyon station to the entrance to Mt. Kumgang in Onjong-ri, Kosong county. The line passes by Anbyon plain, the eastern coast, lake Tongjong, lake Sijung and other scenic spots in Kangwon Province. Unique shapes of stations go well with the landscape.
   The railway line is helpful to the nation's railway transport and the travel of provincial people.
   The young people of Korea finished this monumental project in a little more than a year.

articles.title: Children's camping begins
articles.content:
Interview of chief of Havana mission of  NDFSK
  Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Kwang Gi, chief of the mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) in Cuba, held an interview with the Cuban paper Granma on April 10 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the April 19 popular uprising in south Korea.
   He said that the April 19 Uprising ended in the fall of the Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime and dealt a decisive blow to the colonial rule of the United States.
   It was a historical event which opened up an epochal phase in the development of the south Korean revolutionary movement for independence, democracy and reunification, Pak Kwang Gi noted, and continued:
   Thirtyseven years has passed since the April 19 Uprising. 
However, the democratic freedom and rights of the people have ruthlessly been violated in south Korea.
   The traitors who go against the aspirations of the times and the demands of the nation must be overthrown and the traitorous regime be replaced with an independent and democratic one.
   Our NDFSK and the patriotic people from all walks of life will remove Kim Young Sam regime and establish an independent and democratic regime through a nationwide struggle.

articles.title: National flower show opens
articles.content:
Children's camping begins
   Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) - Children's camping began in Mangyongdae and other parts of the country on Apr. 15 with due ceremonies.
   Every April schoolchildren of Korea do a pleasant camping.
   Participating in the camping this time are sons and daughters of officers of the Korean People's Army, including those from the forefront. 
   The campers will have meetings to learn from the childhood of President Kim Il Sung and the respected General Kim Jong Il and make sports and games, mountaineering and art activities.
